channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18416] Initial support for TABLE function
item.description:
Include support for TABLE function derived table. In SQL standard, it is defined as:

<table function derived table> ::=
  TABLE <left paren> <collection value expression> <right paren>

Further, include limited support for its usage as LATERAL derived table.

This will allow Hive to execute queries such as:

SELECT tf.col1, tf.col2, tf.col3
FROM
  TABLE(VALUES('A', 10, 30.0),('B', 20, 30.0)) AS tf(col1, col2, col3);
SELECT tf.col1, tf.col2, tf.col3
FROM
  (SELECT key, value FROM src) t,
  LATERAL TABLE(VALUES('A', 10, t.key),('B', 20, t.key)) AS tf(col1, col2, col3);

The idea is to rely on AST rewriting for such cases, as TABLE can be implemented using inline UDTF with an array of structs representing the rows in the VALUES clause.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12905629 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Simple insert into table values{} is still resulting in launching of job as earlier which can be avoided by optimizing that job to FetchTask.
I guess SimpleFetchOptimizer doesn't fire on insert queries and it doesn't handle UDTF which it now needs to handle. Can you please file a follow-up jira for it.
Are failures TestDbTxnManager2 related? +1, if not.
ashutoshc, I created HIVE-18451 to extend the FetchOptimizer. I fixed TestDbTxnManager2 (changes expected after this patch) and pushed to master.
This jira is resolved and released with Hive 3.0 If you find an issue with it, please create a new jira.
